attributes.action: Keep the national bus fare cap going for an extended period of time.
attributes.additional_details: Cheaper bus fares would increase bus ridership and help the UK meet its carbon-neutral target. It'd help protect the environment and ease the high cost of living the UK public is facing, since, as it currently stands, the UK has some of the highest costs of transport in Europe due to a lack of subsidies.
attributes.background: Maintain the national bus fare cap for an extended period of time, whether it'd be an increase of months, or preferably years.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632659
